name: treatment of used locomotive | used locomotive | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4900/documentation

The dataset represents the disposal of a locomotive used for both rail and passenger transportation with a life span assumed to be 40 years. ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

Service starts with the transport of the material to be disposal.

The dataset ends with the disposal of one locomotive. The dataset includes the transport of the material and disposal of oil, paint, glass, plastics and polyvinylchloride.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data represents a locomotive currently in operation
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represents Swiss and German conditions
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: More than 80% of the materials of modelled locomotive are metals. For these metals is assumed a complete recycling and thus make a cut of allocation. For the remaining materials, merely the disposal of plastics, glass and paint as well as used oil are taken into account. For the transportation, standard distances are applied for the disposal of glass and plastics. For the remaining materials, a distance of 50 km has been assumed.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data  for Switzerland is used as an estimate for Europe
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on expert estimate on the material consumption of a locomotive.
